page.title: 13ANNUAL EVENTS-CONT
page.content: people from all around.It is the {EDINBURGH CRYSTAL REGATTA}which you might think was only of interest to yachtsmen However although it has grown into the biggest regatta on the Clyde there is also lots of fun for non-sailors with dancing displays,It's a Knockout,tug-of-war,lifeboat rescues painting competitions and mini floats. This event is reminiscent of regattas held here before the war with fun for everyone. Our area does not really have any very ancient customs it seems that something is popular for a time dies out and is replaced later by a similar event. One exception to this is the Remembrance Service on fifth November which is attended by many people although because of population changes few knew those named on the memorial.
